item.title: About
item.description: Keto Diet For Me The ketogenic diet known as keto is deficient in carbohydrates. It is a diet low in carbs and high in fat that has many similarities with Atkins and a low carbohydrate diet. It involves drastically reducing our body carbohydrate intake and replacing it with fat. The decrease in carbohydrates puts the body in a metabolic state called ketose. When this occurs, the body becomes incredibly efficient at burning fat for energy ðŸ¥°.
